Episodes.Title: Granpuff
Episodes.Plot: It is a cold wintery night on the Island of Sodor and the howling wind keeps the engines in the shed awake. Toby decides that what the engines need is to listen to a story. Duck chimes in that the story must have a happy ending. Thomas tells the others a story his driver had told him recently about

Episodes.Title: Sleeping Beauty
Episodes.Plot: Duke is rescued from his shed after many years.

Episodes.Title: Bulldog
Episodes.Plot: Percy is eager to rush out and show off his new coat of paint.

Episodes.Title: You Can't Win
Episodes.Plot: Duke is feeling poorly and Stuart jokes that he and Falcon may have to keep him in order. Duke pays no attention, but when he is taking his passengers home, he starts wheezing and Falcon and Stuart have to help him.

Episodes.Title: Four Little Engines
Episodes.Plot: Edward is sent to be mended. On the way, he meets a narrow gauge engine called Skarloey, who is resting in a shed. The two talk for a while, then Edward leaves. Meanwhile, Sir Handel is pulling some coaches when he has to stop suddenly because a flock of sheep is on the line.

Episodes.Title: A Bad Day for Sir Handel
Episodes.Plot: Sir Handel is bad-tempered and insults Skarloey and the sheds.

Episodes.Title: Peter Sam and the Refreshment Lady
Episodes.Plot: Henry threatens to leave without Peter Sam's passengers, including the Refreshment Lady.

Episodes.Title: Trucks
Episodes.Plot: Harold is returning from his inspection when he spots a little Diesel coming round the mountain. The Diesel is Rusty and despite his friendliness, Rusty has little time to chat and regards Harold as being cheeky. Rusty's arrival pleases Sir Handel and Peter Sam, but Sir Handel remains his usual grum

Episodes.Title: Home at Last
Episodes.Plot: When Skarloey finally returns home, he is met by a new, little Diesel named Rusty. Rusty explains to Skarloey that he helps to mend the line and do odd jobs. Rusty then brings Skarloey back to the shed to meet a glum Peter Sam, who is sad about his accident with the slate trucks and his cracked funn

Episodes.Title: Rock 'n' Roll
Episodes.Plot: Rusty is concerned that Duncan will derail at a bad section of line near Cros-ny-Cuirn due to his rock 'n' roll.

Episodes.Title: Special Funnel
Episodes.Plot: A strong wintry wind makes Peter Sam's funnel wobble.

Episodes.Title: Steamroller
Episodes.Plot: George the steamroller crashes into Sir Handel's train.

Episodes.Title: Passengers and Polish
Episodes.Plot: Nancy, the guard's daughter, has just finished polishing Skarloey. Duncan wants a polish too, but Nancy does not have time because she has to help The Refreshment Lady with the passengers. Duncan is furious and complains about Peter Sam getting a Special Funnel, Sir Handel getting special wheels, an
